description: You'll prepare for CCNP SWITCH exam success and real-world networking mastery with this free course from Chris Bryant. First, we'll spend over an hour working with the Hot Standby Routing Protocol (HSRP) on live Cisco routers, and then it's on to tackle important Cisco switching security fundamentals. You get over 90 minutes of ad-free CCNP SWITCH training at absolutely no cost. Join today!
title: Free CCNP SWITCH Video Boot Camp:  HSRP And Security
